name: Grind Free
description:
***CHECK OUT OUR NEWEST APP "MUSICAL FIREWORKS 2", AND DOWNLOAD IT FREE NOW!***

This is the free version of Grind. If you like it please purchase the full version.

Grind is an advanced, 3D skateboarding game for the iPhone/iPod Touch. It uses the NVIDEA PhysX engine to simulate a very fun and realistic skateboarding experience. Swipe up, down, left, or right to perform tricks which include christ air, kickflip, airwalk, and more. Also, you can edit your own course for unlimited fun and gameplay!

FULL VERSION FEATURES
• 5 unlock-able boards (6 total).
• 2 unlock-able characters (3 total).
• Tricks including kickflip, tailgrab, christ air, heelflip, nosegrab, and airwalk.
• Edit a park with up to 50 ramps and obstacles.
• Smooth graphics and gameplay.
• Challenge Mode - complete the given tricks/spins in one combo.
• Time Attack Mode - skate around for two minutes and rack up as many points as possible.
• Practice Mode - perfect all your trick combos with unlimited time.

If you enjoyed Industrial Park in the previous version, it's still available in Grind 2.5 full version with unlimited play time.
